status.description:
Creating Windows VM with following configuration (expected no is 1000/1200)
With Application and Database (Redis/MySql) Install/Config
Vm will be Having  multiple Nics and IP’s that should be configured while provisioning
Need to Update/Integrate with F5 load balancer and NSX for newly added VM.

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

host="@@{VMware_MySQL.address}@@"

sed -i "/${host}/d" /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

systemctl restart haproxy

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

host="@@{VMware_MySQL.address}@@"

echo "  server host-${host} ${host}:80 weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

systemctl restart haproxy

action_list.description: System action for installing an application
action_list.name: action_install

attrs.script:
$TempDirectory = "C:\Temp"
$packageName = 'vcredist2013'
$installerType = 'exe'
$url64 = 'https://download.microsoft.com/download/0/5/6/056dcda9-d667-4e27-8001-8a0c6971d6b1/vcredist_x64.exe'
$silentArgs = '/Q /norestart'
$validExitCodes = @(0,3010)
$setupPath = "$($TempDirectory)\vcredist_x64.exe"

New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $TempDirectory
(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile("$url64","$setupPath")

$install = Start-Process -FilePath $setupPath -ArgumentList $silentArgs -Wait -NoNewWindow -PassThru
$install.WaitForExit()

$exitCode = $install.ExitCode
$install.Dispose()

Write-Output "Command [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] exited with `'$exitCode`'."
if ($validExitCodes -notcontains $exitCode) {
    Write-Output "Running [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] was not successful. Exit code was '$exitCode'. See log for possible error messages."
}

$packageName = "mysql"
$TempDirectory = "C:\Temp"
$destination = Join-Path $TempDirectory $packageName
$url64 = 'https://dev.mysql.com/get/Downloads/MySQL-5.7/mysql-5.7.18-winx64.zip'
[Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12
(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile("$url64","$TempDirectory\$($packageName).zip")

Write-Output "Extracting $fileFullPath to $destination..."
if (![System.IO.Directory]::Exists($destination)) {[System.IO.Directory]::CreateDirectory($destination)}

Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem
[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::ExtractToDirectory("$TempDirectory\$($packageName).zip", $destination)

Move-Item C:\Temp\mysql\mysql-5.7.18-winx64 C:\Temp\mysql\current
Move-Item C:\Temp\mysql 'C:\Program Files\mysql'

$env:Path = "$($env:Path);C:\Program Files\mysql\current\bin"

[Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("Path", "$($env:Path);C:\Program Files\mysql\current\bin","User")

$iniFileDest = "C:\Program Files\mysql\current\my.ini"
if (!(Test-Path($iniFileDest))) {
  Write-Host "No existing my.ini. Creating default '$iniFileDest' with default locations for datadir."
@"
[mysqld]`r`n
basedir=C:\\Program Files\\mysql\\current`r`n
datadir=C:\\ProgramData\\MySQL\\data
"@ | Out-File $iniFileDest -Force -Encoding ASCII
}

try {
  $defaultDataDir='C:\ProgramData\MySQL\data'
  if (![System.IO.Directory]::Exists($defaultDataDir)) {[System.IO.Directory]::CreateDirectory($defaultDataDir) | Out-Null}
  & 'C:\Program Files\mysql\current\bin\mysqld.exe' --defaults-file=$iniFileDest --initialize-insecure
} catch {
  write-host "MySQL has already been initialized"
}

& 'C:\Program Files\mysql\current\bin\mysqld.exe' --install

Start-Service MySQL

Install-WindowsFeature web-server -IncludeAllSubFeature

New-NetFirewallRule -DisplayName 'HTTP(S) Inbound' -Profile @('Domain', 'Private', 'Public') -Direction Inbound -Action Allow -Protocol TCP -LocalPort @('80')

Set-Content -Value "<html><body>Version 1</body></html>" -Path C:\inetpub\wwwroot\index.html

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

attrs.script:
$packageName = "redis"
$TempDirectory = "C:\Temp"
$destination = Join-Path $TempDirectory $packageName
$url64 = 'https://github.com/MicrosoftArchive/redis/releases/download/win-3.2.100/Redis-x64-3.2.100.zip'
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $TempDirectory
[Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12
(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile("$url64","$TempDirectory\$($packageName).zip")

Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem
[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::ExtractToDirectory("$TempDirectory\$($packageName).zip", $destination)

[Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("Path", "$($env:Path);C:\Temp\redis","User")

cd C:\Temp\redis

.\redis-server.exe --service-install --service-name redis1 --port 6379

Start-Service redis1

  & 'C:\Program Files\mysql\current\bin\mysqld.exe' --defaults-file=$iniFileDest --initialize-insecure
} catch {
  write-host "MySQL has already been initialized"
}

& 'C:\Program Files\mysql\current\bin\mysqld.exe' --install

Start-Service MySQL

$TempDirectory = "C:\Temp"
$packageName = 'vcredist2013'
$installerType = 'exe'
$url64 = 'https://download.microsoft.com/download/0/5/6/056dcda9-d667-4e27-8001-8a0c6971d6b1/vcredist_x64.exe'
$silentArgs = '/Q /norestart'
$validExitCodes = @(0,3010)
$setupPath = "$($TempDirectory)\vcredist_x64.exe"

New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $TempDirectory
(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile("$url64","$setupPath")

$install = Start-Process -FilePath $setupPath -ArgumentList $silentArgs -Wait -NoNewWindow -PassThru
$install.WaitForExit()

$exitCode = $install.ExitCode
$install.Dispose()

Write-Output "Command [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] exited with `'$exitCode`'."
if ($validExitCodes -notcontains $exitCode) {
    Write-Output "Running [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] was not successful. Exit code was '$exitCode'. See log for possible error messages."
}

$packageName = "redis"
$TempDirectory = "C:\Temp"
$destination = Join-Path $TempDirectory $packageName
$url64 = 'https://github.com/MicrosoftArchive/redis/releases/download/win-3.2.100/Redis-x64-3.2.100.zip'
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $TempDirectory
[Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12
(New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile("$url64","$TempDirectory\$($packageName).zip")

Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem
[System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::ExtractToDirectory("$TempDirectory\$($packageName).zip", $destination)

[Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("Path", "$($env:Path);C:\Temp\redis","User")

cd C:\Temp\redis

.\redis-server.exe --service-install --service-name redis1 --port 6379

Start-Service redis1

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

host="@@{MySQL.address}@@"

echo "  server host-${host} ${host}:80 weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

systemctl restart haproxy

spec.description:
Creating Windows VM with following configuration (expected no is 1000/1200)
With Application and Database (Redis/MySql) Install/Config
Vm will be Having  multiple Nics and IP’s that should be configured while provisioning
Need to Update/Integrate with F5 load balancer and NSX for newly added VM.
